a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTBCGLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTBCGLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient

a:t.value: Client is due for BCG vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No BCG primary series dose was administered"
"Client's age is less than or equal to 28 days"
"Client's HIV status is negative or unknown"

def.name: Client is due for BCG vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for BCG vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client is within age range, HIV status is not positive and no live vaccine was administered. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client is immunologically stable and no live vaccine was administered. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client's TB test result is negative and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client is receiving ART, clinically well and immunologically stable. No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client's TB test result is negative and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first BCG dose as no BCG dose was administered, client is receiving ART, clinically well and immunologically stable. No live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications

def.name: Client is not due for BCG vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for BCG vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first BCG dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first BCG dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as client is not immunologically stable. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first BCG dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as ART has not been started. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first BCG dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as client's TB infection test result is positive. Consider evaluating for TB disease or for TB preventive treatment (TPT) eligibility (once TB disease is ruled out).

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as client is not immunologically stable. Check for any vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first BCG dose.

a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first BCG dose as client's TB infection test result is positive. Consider evaluating for TB disease or for TB preventive treatment (TPT) eligibility (once TB disease is ruled out).
